forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 56. Southeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 75, with temperatures falling to around 73 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 3 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the early hours of the morning cloak Downtown San Francisco, the air feels pleasantly crisp with a gentle embrace of tranquility. Overnight, the skies have remained clear, their vastness interrupted only by the soft whisper of a southeast breeze. On this new day, one can expect the sun to rise brilliantly, showering the city with warmth as it ascends towards a high near 75 degrees. The forecast suggests temperatures will enjoy a leisurely descent in the early afternoon, settling around 73, while a gentle northeast wind dances softly across the landscape, adding a touch of invigorating chill.

The absence of fog this morning affords a wonderful clarity, allowing the details of the city to emerge sharply against the horizon. The Golden Gate Bridge stands proudly in the distance, almost greeting the day, an inviting sight for those who venture outdoors. Dressing in light layers will be wise, for the warmth of the day may lull you into shedding heavier garments, only to remind you of the coolness that lingers in the shadows. Perhaps a stroll through one of the city's vibrant neighborhoods, a visit to a quaint café for that perfectly brewed cup of coffee, or a leisurely reading session in a park would harmonize beautifully with the serene atmosphere. In this moment, with clear skies and gentle winds, the city presents itself as a canvas upon which to paint the day with simple pleasures.
